body_html:
There's no fundamental problem with, although I am less than excited to add another STL implementation.

Can we use it instead of something else we're using in core/lib? Can we check what the effect on build times is (by adding it as a dependency in a PR)?

body:
There's no fundamental problem with, although I am less than excited to add another STL implementation. 

Can we use it instead of something else we're using in core/lib? Can we check what the effect on build times is (by adding it as a dependency in a PR)?
